title.rendered: Mission Education students inaugurate Winter Festival at Shaw Public School

content.rendered: Six girls in the age group of 10-15 years from the Mission Education IPER were invited to inaugurate the Winter Carnival at the Shaw Public School in Behala, Kolkata on 19th Dec 2016. They flew bunches of balloons in the midst of huge clap and high encore to declare the festival open. The girls also performed dance based on the social issue of child abuse namely ‘Stop Crime against Children’ in the Carnival. The girls were given coupon from the carnival authority to spend on food and games. They enjoyed the time to their heart’s content.
